name: Junior necro executive assistant
description:
Junior necro executive assistant

Submission to Wowie Jam 4.0 "Collaborate with an AI"

The magical intelligence in charge of cleaning the dungeon needs help. It can't drive properly the skeletons that collect the slime.

You are projected into the dungeon to help the skeletons.

Controls
  • Move with arrow keys
  • Press Space to call the skeletons towards you.   
Some gameplay elements:
  • Your score is the quantity of slime collected by the skeletons
  • Skeletons are often blocked on obstacles. Call them from an alternate direction to unblock them
  • Slime, slugs and skeletons are fatal to your projection (end game)
  • Slugs also hear your calls. This is dangerous, but also an opportunity to drive them to the skeletons, or to free a passage

Note: skeletons are dumb. Don't get too mad. The game is to help the AI to make something of them!

Credits:

Thanks to https://melthie.itch.io/ for the neat dungeon tileset

Sounds: https://freesound.org/
